mean_cn: n.负担；  v.拉紧；劳累；过度使用
mean_en: pressure on somebody/something because they have too much to do or manage, or something very difficult to deal with; the problems, worry or anxiety that this produces
sentence: Her kid's summer course fees put her under great financial strain.
sentence_trans: 孩子的暑假班费用使她承受着很大的经济负担。
